1—9 | La Fossa con Spuntoni infligge 5 danni a quella creatura.
10—20 | La Fossa con Spuntoni infligge 5 danni a quella creatura. Crea una pedina Tesoro.

foreignNames.name: とげの落とし穴
foreignNames.text:
瞬速
{5}, {T}, とげの落とし穴を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。１個のd20を振る。
１—９ | とげの落とし穴はそのクリーチャーに５点のダメージを与える。
10—20 | とげの落とし穴はそのクリーチャーに５点のダメージを与える。宝物・トークン１つを生成する。

foreignNames.name: 못 구덩이 함정
foreignNames.text:
섬광
{5}, {T}, 못 구덩이 함정을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한 후, 20면체를 굴린다.
1—9 | 못 구덩이 함정은 그 생물에게 피해 5점을 입힌다.
10-20 | 못 구덩이 함정은 그 생물에게 피해 5점을 입힌다. 보물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignNames.name: Armadilha do Poço com Estacas
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo
{5}, {T}, sacrifique Armadilha do Poço com Estacas: Escolha a criatura alvo e depois role um d20.
1—9 | Armadilha do Poço com Estacas causa 5 pontos de dano àquela criatura.
10—20 | Armadilha do Poço com Estacas causa 5 pontos de dano àquela criatura. Crie uma ficha de Tesouro.

foreignNames.name: Ловчая Яма с Шипами
foreignNames.text:
Миг
{5}, {T}, пожертвуйте Ловчую Яму с Шипами: выберите целевое существо, затем бросьте d20.
1—9 | Ловчая Яма с Шипами наносит 5 повреждений тому существу.
10—20 | Ловчая Яма с Шипами наносит 5 повреждений тому существу. Создайте одну фишку Клада.

foreignNames.name: 刺坑陷阱
foreignNames.text:
闪现
{5}，{T}，牺牲刺坑陷阱：选择目标生物，然后掷一颗d20。
1～9 | 刺坑陷阱对该生物造成5点伤害。
10～20 | 刺坑陷阱对该生物造成5点伤害。派出一个珍宝衍生物。

foreignNames.name: 刺坑陷阱
foreignNames.text:
閃現
{5}，{T}，犧牲刺坑陷阱：選擇目標生物，然後擲一顆d20。
1～9 | 刺坑陷阱對該生物造成5點傷害。
10～20 | 刺坑陷阱對該生物造成5點傷害。派出一個珍寶衍生物。

cards.originalText:
Flash
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Spiked Pit Trap: Choose target creature, then roll a d20.
1–9 | Spiked Pit Trap deals 5 damage to that creature.
10–20 | Spiked Pit Trap deals 5 damage to that creature. Create a Treasure token.

cards.name: Treasure Chest
cards.text:
{4}, Sacrifice Treasure Chest: Roll a d20.
1 | Trapped! — You lose 3 life.
2—9 | Create five Treasure tokens.
10—19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.
20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

rulings.text: The “otherwise” in the last ability refers to whether or not you put it onto the battlefield, not whether or not it's an artifact card. You may put it into your hand even if it's an artifact card.
If you choose to put the card into your hand, you don't need to reveal it.
Dice are identified by the number of faces each one has. For example, a d20 is a twenty-sided die.

Dice used must have equally likely outcomes and the roll must be fair. Although physical dice are recommended, digital substitutes are allowed, provided they have the same number of equally likely outcomes as specified in the original roll instruction.
An ability that tells you to roll a die will also specify what to do with the result of that roll. Most often, this is in the form of a “results table” in the card text.

The instruction to roll a die and the effect that occurs because of the result are all part of the same ability. Players do not get the chance to respond to the ability after knowing the result of the roll.

An effect that says “choose a target, then roll a d20” or similar still uses the normal process of putting an ability on the stack and resolving it. Choosing targets is part of putting the ability on the stack and rolling the d20 happens later, as the ability resolves.

Some effects may modify the result of a die roll. This may be part of the instruction to roll a die or it may come from other cards. Anything that references the “result” of a die roll is looking for the result after these modifications. Anything that is looking for the “natural result” is looking for the number shown on the face of the die before these modifications.

Some abilities, like that of Pixie Guide and Barbarian Class, replace rolling a die with rolling extra dice and ignoring the lowest roll. The ignored rolls are not considered for the effect that instructed you to roll a die, and do not cause abilities to trigger. For all intents and purposes, once you determine which dice count, any extra dice were never rolled.
Some effects instruct you to roll again. This uses the same number and type of dice as the original roll, and that roll will use the same set of possible outcomes.

While playing Planechase, rolling the planar die will cause any ability that triggers whenever a player rolls one or more dice to trigger. However, any effect that refers to a numerical result will ignore the rolling of the planar die.

Tournament events have more specific rules regarding dice and die-rolling. For more information, please see the most recent version of the Magic Tournament Rules at https://wpn.wizards.com/en/document/magic-gathering-tournament-rules.

foreignNames.name: Schatztruhe
foreignNames.text:
{4}, opfere die Schatztruhe: Würfle einen W20.
1 | Falle — Du verlierst 3 Lebenspunkte.
2—9 | Erzeuge fünf Schatz-Spielsteine.
10—19 | Du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu und ziehst drei Karten.
20 | Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte. Falls es eine Artefaktkarte ist, kannst du sie ins Spiel bringen. Nimm die Karte sonst auf deine Hand. Mische danach.

foreignNames.name: Cofre del tesoro
foreignNames.text:
{4}, sacrificar el Cofre del tesoro: Tira 1d20.
1 | ¡Hay una trampa — Pierdes 3 vidas.
2—9 | Crea cinco fichas de Tesoro.
10—19 | Ganas 3 vidas y robas tres cartas.
20 | Busca en tu biblioteca una carta. Si es una carta de artefacto, puedes ponerla en el campo de batalla. De lo contrario, pon esa carta en tu mano. Luego, baraja.

foreignNames.name: Coffre au trésor
foreignNames.text:
{4}, sacrifiez le Coffre au trésor : Lancez un d20.
1 | Piégé — Vous perdez 3 points de vie.
2—9 | Créez cinq jetons Trésor.
10—19 | Vous gagnez 3 points de vie et vous piochez trois cartes.
20 | Cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque. Si c'est une carte d'artefact, vous pouvez la mettre sur le champ de bataille. Sinon, mettez cette carte dans votre main. Puis mélangez.

foreignNames.name: Forziere del Tesoro
foreignNames.text:
{4}, Sacrifica il Forziere del Tesoro: Tira un d20.
1 | Trappola — Perdi 3 punti vita.
2—9 | Crea cinque pedine Tesoro.
10—19 | Guadagni 3 punti vita e peschi tre carte.
20 | Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta. Se è una carta artefatto, puoi metterla sul campo di battaglia. Altrimenti, aggiungi quella carta alla tua mano. Poi rimescola.

foreignNames.name: 宝箱
foreignNames.text:
{4}, 宝箱を生け贄に捧げる：１個のd20を振る。
1 | 罠だ！ — あなたは３点のライフを失う。
２—９ | 宝物・トークン５つを生成する。
10—19 | あなたは３点のライフを得てカード３枚を引く。
20 | あなたのライブラリーからカード１枚を探す。それがアーティファクト・カードであるなら、あなたはそれを戦場に出してもよい。そうでないなら、そのカードをあなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 보물 상자
foreignNames.text:
{4}, 보물 상자를 희생한다: 20면체를 굴린다.
1 | 함정 작동 — 당신은 생명 3점을 잃는다.
2-9 | 보물 토큰 다섯 개를 만든다.
10—19 | 당신은 생명 3점을 얻고 카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
20 | 당신의 서고에서 카드를 찾는다. 그 카드가 마법물체 카드라면, 당신은 그 카드를 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 그렇지 않다면 그 카드를 당신의 손에 넣는다. 그 후 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Baú de Tesouro
foreignNames.text:
{4}, sacrifique Baú de Tesouro: Role um d20.
1 | Armadilha — Você perde 3 pontos de vida.
2—9 | Crie cinco fichas de Tesouro.
10—19 | Você ganha 3 pontos de vida e compra três cards.
20 | Procure um card em seu grimório. Se for um card de artefato, você pode colocá-lo no campo de batalha. Do contrário, coloque aquele card em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe.

foreignNames.name: Сундук с Сокровищами
foreignNames.text:
{4}, пожертвуйте Сундук с Сокровищами: бросьте d20.
1 | Ловушка — Вы теряете 3 жизни.
2—9 | Создайте пять фишек Клада.
10—19 | Вы получаете 3 жизни и берете три карты.
20 | Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту. Если это карта артефакта, вы можете положить ее на поле битвы. В противном случае, положите ту карту в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 宝箱
foreignNames.text:
{4}，牺牲宝箱：掷一颗d20。
1 | 陷阱！～你失去3点生命。
2～9 | 派出五个珍宝衍生物。
10～19 | 你获得3点生命且抓三张牌。
20 | 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌。如果它是神器牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。然后洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 寶箱
foreignNames.text:
{4}，犧牲寶箱：擲一顆d20。
1 | 陷阱！～你失去3點生命。
2～9 | 派出五個珍寶衍生物。
10～19 | 你獲得3點生命且抽三張牌。
20 | 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張牌。如果它是神器牌，則你可以將之放進戰場。若否，則將該牌置於你手上。然後洗牌。

cards.originalText:
{4}, Sacrifice Treasure Chest: Roll a d20.
1 | Trapped — You lose 3 life.
2–9 | Create five Treasure tokens.
10–19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.
20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

cards.name: Cave of the Frost Dragon
cards.text:
If you control two or more other lands, Cave of the Frost Dragon enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{4}{W}: Cave of the Frost Dragon becomes a 3/4 white Dragon creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: If Cave of the Frost Dragon enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.
If you turn Cave of the Frost Dragon into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

foreignNames.name: Höhle des Frostdrachen
foreignNames.text:
Falls du zwei oder mehr andere Länder kontrollierst, kommt die Höhle des Frostdrachen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {W}.
{4}{W}: Die Höhle des Frostdrachen wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/4 weißen Drache-Kreatur mit Flugfähigkeit. Sie ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignNames.name: Cueva del dragón de escarcha
foreignNames.text:
Si controlas otras dos o más tierras, la Cueva del dragón de escarcha entra al campo de batalla girada.
{T}: Agrega {W}.
{4}{W}: La Cueva del dragón de escarcha se convierte en una criatura Dragón blanca 3/4 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignNames.name: Grotte du dragon de givre
foreignNames.text:
Si vous contrôlez au moins deux autres terrains, la Grotte du dragon de givre arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {W}.
{4}{W} : La Grotte du dragon de givre devient une créature 3/4 blanche Dragon avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignNames.name: Grotta del Drago del Gelo
foreignNames.text:
Se controlli altre due o più terre, la Grotta del Drago del Gelo entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {W}.
{4}{W}: La Grotta del Drago del Gelo diventa una creatura Drago 3/4 bianca con volare fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.

foreignNames.name: フロスト・ドラゴンの洞窟
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれ以外の２つ以上の土地をコントロールしているなら、フロスト・ドラゴンの洞窟はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{W}を加える。
{4}{W}：ターン終了時まで、フロスト・ドラゴンの洞窟は飛行を持つ白の３/４のドラゴン・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

foreignNames.name: 서리 용의 동굴
foreignNames.text:
당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종한다면, 서리 용의 동굴은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W}를 추가한다.
{4}{W}: 서리 용의 동굴은 턴종료까지 비행을 가진 3/4 백색 용 생물이 된다. 이 생물은 여전히 대지다.

foreignNames.name: Caverna do Dragão Gélido
foreignNames.text:
Se você controla dois ou mais outros terrenos, Caverna do Dragão Gélido entra no campo de batalha virada.
{T}: Adicione {W}.
{4}{W}: Caverna do Dragão Gélido torna-se uma criatura Dragão branco 3/4 com voar até o final do turno. Ele ainda é um terreno.

foreignNames.name: Пещера Морозного Дракона
foreignNames.text:
Если под вашим контролем есть не менее двух других земель, Пещера Морозного Дракона выходит на поле битвы повернутой.
{T}: добавьте {W}.
{4}{W}: до конца хода Пещера Морозного Дракона становится существом 3/4 белый Дракон с Полетом. При этом она остается землей.

foreignNames.name: 霜龙洞穴
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则霜龙洞穴须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}。
{4}{W}：霜龙洞穴成为3/4白色，具飞行异能的龙生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

foreignNames.name: 霜龍洞穴
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控兩個或更多其他地，則霜龍洞穴須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{W}。
{4}{W}：霜龍洞穴成為3/4白色，具飛行異能的龍生物直到回合結束。它仍然是地。

cards.originalText:
If you control two or more other lands, Cave of the Frost Dragon enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{4}{W}: Cave of the Frost Dragon becomes a 3/4 white Dragon creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

cards.name: Den of the Bugbear
cards.text:
If you control two or more other lands, Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{3}{R}: Until end of turn, Den of the Bugbear becomes a 3/2 red Goblin creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking." It's still a land.

rulings.text: If Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.
If you turn Den of the Bugbear into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

If Den of the Bugbear's last ability is activated multiple times in one turn, it will have multiple instances of the triggered ability that it grants. For example, if you activate it twice and attack, you will create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

foreignNames.name: Bau des Grottenschrats
foreignNames.text:
Falls du zwei oder mehr andere Länder kontrollierst, kommt der Bau des Grottenschrats getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {R}.
{3}{R}: Der Bau des Grottenschrats wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/2 roten Goblin-Kreatur mit „Immer wenn diese Kreatur angreift, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 1/1 roten Goblin-Kreaturenspielstein." Er ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignNames.name: Cubil del osgo
foreignNames.text:
Si controlas otras dos o más tierras, el Cubil del osgo entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {R}.
{3}{R}: Hasta el final del turno, el Cubil del osgo se convierte en una criatura Trasgo roja 3/2 con "Siempre que esta criatura ataque, crea una ficha de criatura Trasgo roja 1/1 que está girada y atacando". Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignNames.name: Tanière du gobelours
foreignNames.text:
Si vous contrôlez au moins deux autres terrains, la Tanière du gobelours arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {R}.
{3}{R} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la Tanière du gobelours devient une créature 3/2 rouge Gobelin avec « À chaque fois que cette créature attaque, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Gobelin qui est engagé et attaquant ». C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignNames.name: Tana del Bugbear
foreignNames.text:
Se controlli altre due o più terre, la Tana del Bugbear entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {R}.
{3}{R}: Fino alla fine del turno, la Tana del Bugbear diventa una creatura Goblin 3/2 rossa con "Ogniqualvolta questa creatura attacca, crea una pedina creatura Goblin 1/1 rossa TAPpata e attaccante". È ancora una terra.

foreignNames.name: バグベアの居住地
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれ以外の２つ以上の土地をコントロールしているなら、バグベアの居住地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}を加える。
{3}{R}：ターン終了時まで、バグベアの居住地は「このクリーチャーが攻撃するたび、赤の１/１のゴブリン・クリーチャー・トークン１体をタップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で生成する。」を持つ赤の３/２のゴブリン・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

foreignNames.name: 버그베어의 소굴
foreignNames.text:
당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종한다면, 버그베어의 소굴은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R}를 추가한다.
{3}{R}: 턴종료까지, 버그베어의 소굴은 "이 생물이 공격할 때마다, 탭되어 공격 중인 1/1 적색 고블린 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다."를 가진 3/2 적색 고블린 생물이 된다. 이 생물은 여전히 대지다.

foreignNames.name: Covil do Bugurso
foreignNames.text:
Se você controla dois ou mais outros terrenos, Covil do Bugurso entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {R}.
{3}{R}: Até o final do turno, Covil do Bugurso torna-se uma criatura Goblin vermelha 3/2 com "Toda vez que esta criatura atacar, crie uma ficha de criatura Goblin vermelha 1/1 virada e atacando". Ele ainda é um terreno.

foreignNames.name: Логово Багбера
foreignNames.text:
Если под вашим контролем есть не менее двух других земель, Логово Багбера выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{T}: добавьте {R}.
{3}{R}: до конца хода Логово Багбера становится существом 3/2 красный Гоблин со способностью «Каждый раз, когда это существо атакует, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 красный Гоблин повернутой и атакующей». При этом оно остается землей.

foreignNames.name: 熊哥布林窝巢
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则熊哥布林窝巢须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}。
{3}{R}：直到回合结束，熊哥布林窝巢成为3/2红色鬼怪生物，且具有「每当此生物攻击时，派出一个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。」它仍然是地。

foreignNames.name: 熊哥布林窩巢
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控兩個或更多其他地，則熊哥布林窩巢須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}。
{3}{R}：直到回合結束，熊哥布林窩巢成為3/2紅色鬼怪生物，且具有「每當此生物攻擊時，派出一個1/1紅色鬼怪衍生生物，其為橫置且正進行攻擊。」它仍然是地。

cards.originalText:
If you control two or more other lands, Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{3}{R}: Until end of turn, Den of the Bugbear becomes a 3/2 red Goblin creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking." It's still a land.

cards.name: Dungeon Descent
cards.text:
Dungeon Descent enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}, Tap an untapped legendary creature you control: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

rulings.text: To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player’s deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room’s ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you’re already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.

foreignNames.name: Gewölbe-Eingang
foreignNames.text:
Der Gewölbe-Eingang kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{4}, {T}, tappe eine ungetappte legendäre Kreatur, die du kontrollierst: Wage dich ins Gewölbe. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei. (Betritt den ersten Raum oder rücke in den nächsten Raum vor.)

foreignNames.name: Descenso a la mazmorra
foreignNames.text:
El Descenso a la mazmorra entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{4}, {T}, girar una criatura legendaria enderezada que controlas: Adéntrate en la mazmorra. Activa esto solo como un conjuro. (Entra en la primera sala o avanza a la siguiente.)

foreignNames.name: Descente dans le donjon
foreignNames.text:
La Descente dans le donjon arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{4}, {T}, engagez une créature légendaire dégagée que vous contrôlez : Aventurez-vous dans le donjon. N'activez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel. (Entrez dans la première pièce ou avancez jusqu'à la pièce suivante.)

foreignNames.name: Discesa nel Dungeon
foreignNames.text:
La Discesa nel Dungeon entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{4}, {T}, TAPpa una creatura leggendaria STAPpata che controlli: Esplora il dungeon. Attiva solo come una stregoneria. (Entra nella prima stanza o avanza a quella successiva.)

foreignNames.name: ダンジョンの入口
foreignNames.text:
ダンジョンの入口はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{C}を加える。
{4}, {T}, あなたがコントロールしていてアンタップ状態である伝説のクリーチャーをタップする：ダンジョン探索をする。起動はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。（ダンジョン探索をするとは、最初の部屋へ入るか、次の部屋へ進むことである。）

foreignNames.name: 던전 내리막길
foreignNames.text:
던전 내리막길은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {C}를 추가한다.
{4}, {T}, 당신이 조종하는 언탭된 전설적 생물을 탭한다: 던전에 진입한다. 집중마법 시기에만 활성화할 수 있다. (첫 번째 방에 들어가거나 다음 방으로 전진한다.)

foreignNames.name: Descida da Masmorra
foreignNames.text:
Descida da Masmorra entra no campo de batalha virada.
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{4}, {T}, vire uma criatura lendária desvirada que você controla: Aventure-se na masmorra. Ative somente como um feitiço. (Entre na primeira sala ou prossiga para a próxima.)

foreignNames.name: Спуск в Подземелье
foreignNames.text:
Спуск в Подземелье выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{4}, {T}, поверните неповернутое легендарное существо под вашим контролем: углубитесь в подземелье. Активируйте только как волшебство. (Войдите в первую комнату или перейдите в следующую комнату.)

foreignNames.name: 地城坡道
foreignNames.text:
地城坡道须横置进战场。
{T}：加{C}。
{4}，{T}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的传奇生物：深入地城。只能于法术时机起动。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

foreignNames.name: 地城坡道
foreignNames.text:
地城坡道須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{C}。
{4}，{T}，橫置一個由你操控且未橫置的傳奇生物：深入地城。只能於巫術時機起動。（進入第一個房間，或前進至下一個房間。）

cards.originalText:
Dungeon Descent enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}, Tap an untapped legendary creature you control: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Parts of Faerûn still churn with the magic of arrogant Netherese archmages long dead.

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische danach.
foreignNames.flavor: Teile von Faerûn sind immer noch von der Magie arroganter, längst verstorbener Erzmagier von Nesseril aufgewühlt.

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay partes de Faerûn que siguen transformándose con la magia de los archimagos nethereses, fallecidos tiempo ha.

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélangez.
foreignNames.flavor: La magie d'archimages nétherisses arrogants morts depuis longtemps bouillonne encore dans certaines régions de Faerûn.

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola.
foreignNames.flavor: Alcune zone di Faerûn sono ancora colme della magia degli arroganti arcimaghi di Netheril morti da tempo.

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: フェイルーンの一部は未だに昔に死んだ傲慢なネザリス人の大魔道士の魔法によって煮えくり返っている。

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 페이룬의 일부분에서는 오래 전에 죽은 오만한 네서리스 대마법사들의 마법이 여전히 휘몰아치고 있다.

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe.
foreignNames.flavor: Há partes de Faerûn que ainda sofrem os efeitos da magia dos defuntos arquimagos arrogantes netherêses.

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: В некоторых частях Фаэруна до сих пор бурлит магия высокомерных нетерильских архимагов, давно уже мертвых.

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 虽然耐瑟瑞尔的自负大法师早已死去，费伦的某些部分仍受其魔法扰动。

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然耐瑟瑞爾的自負大法師早已死去，費倫的某些部分仍受其魔法擾動。

cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Hall of Storm Giants
cards.text:
If you control two or more other lands, Hall of Storm Giants enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{5}{U}: Until end of turn, Hall of Storm Giants becomes a 7/7 blue Giant creature with ward {3}. It's still a land. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)

rulings.text: If Hall of Storm Giants enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.
If you turn Hall of Storm Giants into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

If you activate Hall of Storm Giants's last ability multiple times, it gains multiple instances of ward {3}. Each of those instances will trigger separately and ask the opponent who controls the spell or ability to pay {3}. If they don't for any of those instances, the spell or ability will be countered.

If an opponent casts a spell or ability that targets Hall of Storm Giants, and you activate the last ability in response, the ward ability Hall of Storm Giants gains won't trigger. (However, if it already had ward at the moment it became the target of the spell or ability, that instance of ward would trigger.)

foreignNames.name: Halle der Sturmriesen
foreignNames.text:
Falls du zwei oder mehr andere Länder kontrollierst, kommt die Halle der Sturmriesen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {U}.
{5}{U}: Die Halle der Sturmriesen wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 7/7 blauen Riese-Kreatur mit Abwehr {3}. Sie ist immer noch ein Land. (Immer wenn sie das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, den bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert, neutralisiere ihn bzw. sie, es sei denn, jener Spieler bezahlt {3}.)

foreignNames.name: Salón de los gigantes de las tormentas
foreignNames.text:
Si controlas otras dos o más tierras, el Salón de los gigantes de las tormentas entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {U}.
{5}{U}: Hasta el final del turno, el Salón de los gigantes de las tormentas se convierte en una criatura Gigante azul 7/7 con la habilidad de rebatir {3}. Sigue siendo una tierra. (Siempre que sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad que controla un oponente, contrarréstalo a menos que ese jugador pague {3}.)

foreignNames.name: Halle des géants des tempêtes
foreignNames.text:
Si vous contrôlez au moins deux autres terrains, la Halle des géants des tempêtes arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {U}.
{5}{U} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la Halle des géants des tempêtes devient une créature 7/7 bleue Géant avec parade {3}. C'est toujours un terrain. (À chaque fois qu'elle devient la cible d'un sort ou d'une capacité qu'un adversaire contrôle, contrecarrez ce sort ou cette capacité à moins que ce joueur ne paie {3}.)

foreignNames.name: Sala dei Giganti delle Tempeste
foreignNames.text:
Se controlli altre due o più terre, la Sala dei Giganti delle Tempeste entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {U}.
{5}{U}: Fino alla fine del turno, la Sala dei Giganti delle Tempeste diventa una creatura Gigante 7/7 blu con egida {3}. È ancora una terra. (Ogniqualvolta diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità controllata da un avversario, neutralizza quella magia o abilità a meno che quel giocatore non paghi {3}.)

foreignNames.name: ストーム・ジャイアントの聖堂
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれ以外の２つ以上の土地をコントロールしているなら、ストーム・ジャイアントの聖堂はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{U}を加える。
{5}{U}：ターン終了時まで、ストーム・ジャイアントの聖堂は護法{3}を持つ青の７/７の巨人・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。（これが対戦相手がコントロールしている呪文や能力の対象になるたび、そのプレイヤーが{3}を支払わないかぎり、その呪文や能力を打ち消す。）

foreignNames.name: 폭풍 거인의 전당
foreignNames.text:
당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종한다면, 폭풍 거인의 전당은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {U}를 추가한다.
{5}{U}: 턴종료까지, 폭풍 거인의 전당은 보호진 {3}을 가진 7/7 청색 거인 생물이 된다. 이 생물은 여전히 대지다. (이 생물이 상대가 조종하는 주문 또는 능력의 목표가 될 때마다, 그 플레이어가 {3}을 지불하지 않는 한 그 주문 또는 능력을 무효화한다.)

foreignNames.name: Salão dos Gigantes da Tempestade
foreignNames.text:
Se você controla dois ou mais outros terrenos, Salão dos Gigantes da Tempestade entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {U}.
{5}{U}: Até o final do turno, Salão dos Gigantes da Tempestade torna-se uma criatura Gigante azul 7/7 com salvaguarda {3}. Ele ainda é um terreno. (Toda vez que ele se tornar alvo de uma mágica ou habilidade que um oponente controla, anule-a, a menos que aquele jogador pague {3}.)

foreignNames.name: Чертог Штормовых Великанов
foreignNames.text:
Если под вашим контролем есть не менее двух других земель, Чертог Штормовых Великанов выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{T}: добавьте {U}.
{5}{U}: до конца хода Чертог Штормовых Великанов становится существом 7/7 синий Гигант с Оберегом {3}. При этом он остается землей. (Каждый раз, когда он становится целью заклинания или способности под контролем оппонента, отмените то заклинание или способность, если тот игрок не заплатит {3}.)

foreignNames.name: 风暴巨人大厅
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则风暴巨人大厅须横置进战场。
{T}：加{U}。
{5}{U}：直到回合结束，风暴巨人大厅成为7/7蓝色，具守护{3}的巨人生物。它仍然是地。（每当它成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{3}，否则反击之。）

foreignNames.name: 風暴巨人大廳
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控兩個或更多其他地，則風暴巨人大廳須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{U}。
{5}{U}：直到回合結束，風暴巨人大廳成為7/7藍色，具守護{3}的巨人生物。它仍然是地。（每當它成為由對手操控之咒語或異能的目標時，除非該玩家支付{3}，否則反擊之。）

cards.originalText:
If you control two or more other lands, Hall of Storm Giants enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
{5}{U}: Until end of turn, Hall of Storm Giants becomes a 7/7 blue Giant creature with ward {3}. It's still a land. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)

cards.name: Hive of the Eye Tyrant
cards.text:
If you control two or more other lands, Hive of the Eye Tyrant enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{3}{B}: Until end of turn, Hive of the Eye Tyrant becomes a 3/3 black Beholder creature with menace and "Whenever this creature attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard." It's still a land.

rulings.text: If Hive of the Eye Tyrant enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.
If you turn Hive of the Eye Tyrant into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

If you activate Hive of the Eye Tyrant's last ability multiple times, it gains multiple instances of the triggered ability that exiles cards. For example, if you activate it twice and attack, you will choose two target cards to exile (or the same card twice, if you want to).

foreignNames.name: Grotte des Augentyrannen
foreignNames.text:
Falls du zwei oder mehr andere Länder kontrollierst, kommt die Grotte des Augentyrannen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {B}.
{3}{B}: Die Grotte des Augentyrannen wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/3 schwarzen Betrachter-Kreatur mit Bedrohlichkeit und „Immer wenn diese Kreatur angreift, schicke eine Karte deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof des verteidigenden Spielers ins Exil." Sie ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignNames.name: Colmena del ojo tirano
foreignNames.text:
Si controlas otras dos o más tierras, la Colmena del ojo tirano entra al campo de batalla girada.
{T}: Agrega {B}.
{3}{B}: Hasta el final del turno, la Colmena del ojo tirano se convierte en una criatura Contemplador negra 3/3 con la habilidad de amenaza y "Siempre que esta criatura ataque, exilia la carta objetivo del cementerio del jugador defensor". Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignNames.name: Essaim du despote tyrannœil
foreignNames.text:
Si vous contrôlez au moins deux autres terrains, l'Essaim du despote tyrannœil arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
{T} : Ajoutez {B}.
{3}{B} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, l'Essaim du despote tyrannœil devient une créature 3/3 noire Tyrannœil avec la menace et « À chaque fois que cette créature attaque, exilez une carte ciblée du cimetière du joueur défenseur ». C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignNames.name: Tana dell'Occhio Tiranno
foreignNames.text:
Se controlli altre due o più terre, la Tana dell'Occhio Tiranno entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {B}.
{3}{B}: Fino alla fine del turno, la Tana dell'Occhio Tiranno diventa una creatura Beholder 3/3 nera con minacciare e "Ogniqualvolta questa creatura attacca, esilia una carta bersaglio dal cimitero del giocatore in difesa". È ancora una terra.

foreignNames.name: 目玉の暴君の住処
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれ以外の２つ以上の土地をコントロールしているなら、目玉の暴君の住処はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{B}を加える。
{3}{B}：ターン終了時まで、目玉の暴君の住処は威迫と「このクリーチャーが攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーの墓地にあるカード１枚を対象とする。それを追放する。」を持つ黒の３/３のビホルダー・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

foreignNames.name: 눈 폭군의 둥지
foreignNames.text:
당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종한다면, 눈 폭군의 둥지는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {B}를 추가한다.
{3}{B}: 턴종료까지, 눈 폭군의 둥지는 호전적 및 "이 생물이 공격할 때마다, 수비플레이어의 무덤에 있는 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 추방한다."를 가진 3/3 흑색 비홀더 생물이 된다. 이 생물은 여전히 대지다.

foreignNames.name: Colmeia do Olho Tirano
foreignNames.text:
Se você controla dois ou mais outros terrenos, Colmeia do Olho Tirano entra no campo de batalha virada.
{T}: Adicione {B}.
{3}{B}: Até o final do turno, Colmeia do Olho Tirano torna-se uma criatura Observador preta 3/3 com ameaçar e "Toda vez que esta criatura atacar, exile o card alvo do cemitério do jogador defensor". Ele ainda é um terreno.

foreignNames.name: Улей Ока-Тирана
foreignNames.text:
Если под вашим контролем есть не менее двух других земель, Улей Ока-Тирана выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{T}: добавьте {B}.
{3}{B}: до конца хода Улей Ока-Тирана становится существом 3/3 черный Злобоглаз с Угрозой и способностью «Каждый раз, когда это существо атакует, изгоните целевую карту из кладбища защищающегося игрока». При этом он остается землей.

foreignNames.name: 魔眼暴君栖巢
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则魔眼暴君栖巢须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}。
{3}{B}：直到回合结束，魔眼暴君栖巢成为3/3黑色眼魔生物，且具有威慑与「每当此生物攻击时，将目标牌从防御牌手的坟墓场放逐。」它仍然是地。

foreignNames.name: 魔眼暴君棲巢
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控兩個或更多其他地，則魔眼暴君棲巢須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{B}。
{3}{B}：直到回合結束，魔眼暴君棲巢成為3/3黑色眼魔生物，且具有威懾與「每當此生物攻擊時，將目標牌從防禦玩家的墳墓場放逐。」它仍然是地。

cards.originalText:
If you control two or more other lands, Hive of the Eye Tyrant enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{3}{B}: Until end of turn, Hive of the Eye Tyrant becomes a 3/3 black Beholder creature with menace and "Whenever this creature attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard." It's still a land.

cards.name: Lair of the Hydra
cards.text:
If you control two or more other lands, Lair of the Hydra enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{X}{G}: Until end of turn, Lair of the Hydra becomes an X/X green Hydra creature. It's still a land. X can't be 0.

rulings.text: If Lair of the Hydra enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands, it doesn't take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.
If you turn Lair of the Hydra into a creature but haven't controlled it continuously since your most recent turn began, you won't be able to activate its mana ability or attack with it.

foreignNames.name: Hort der Hydra
foreignNames.text:
Falls du zwei oder mehr andere Länder kontrollierst, kommt der Hort der Hydra getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {G}.
{X}{G}: Der Hort der Hydra wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer X/X grünen Hydra-Kreatur. Er ist immer noch ein Land. X kann nicht 0 sein.

foreignNames.name: Guarida de la hidra
foreignNames.text:
Si controlas otras dos o más tierras, la Guarida de la hidra entra al campo de batalla girada.
{T}: Agrega {G}.
{X}{G}: Hasta el final del turno, la Guarida de la hidra se convierte en una criatura Hidra verde X/X. Sigue siendo una tierra. X no puede ser 0.

foreignNames.name: Repaire de l'hydre
foreignNames.text:
Si vous contrôlez au moins deux autres terrains, le Repaire de l'hydre arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
{T} : Ajoutez {G}.
{X}{G} : Jusqu'à la fin du tour, le Repaire de l'hydre devient une créature X/X verte Hydre. C'est toujours un terrain. X ne peut pas être 0.

foreignNames.name: Tana dell'Idra
foreignNames.text:
Se controlli altre due o più terre, la Tana dell'Idra entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {G}.
{X}{G}: Fino alla fine del turno, la Tana dell'Idra diventa una creatura Idra X/X verde. È ancora una terra. X non può essere 0.

foreignNames.name: ハイドラの巣
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれ以外の２つ以上の土地をコントロールしているなら、ハイドラの巣はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{G}を加える。
{X}{G}：ターン終了時まで、ハイドラの巣は緑のＸ/Ｘのハイドラ・クリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。Ｘは０にできない。

foreignNames.name: 히드라 소굴
foreignNames.text:
당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종한다면, 히드라 소굴은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {G}를 추가한다.
{X}{G}: 턴종료까지, 히드라 소굴은 X/X 녹색 히드라 생물이 된다. 이 생물은 여전히 대지다. X는 0일 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Covil da Hidra
foreignNames.text:
Se você controla dois ou mais outros terrenos, Covil da Hidra entra no campo de batalha virado.
{T}: Adicione {G}.
{X}{G}: Até o final do turno, Covil da Hidra torna-se uma criatura Hidra verde X/X. Ele ainda é um terreno. X não pode ser 0.

foreignNames.name: Логово Гидры
foreignNames.text:
Если под вашим контролем есть не менее двух других земель, Логово Гидры выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
{T}: добавьте {G}.
{X}{G}: до конца хода Логово Гидры становится существом X/X зеленая Гидра. При этом оно остается землей. Х не может равняться 0.

foreignNames.name: 多头蛇蜥巢穴
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则多头蛇蜥巢穴须横置进战场。
{T}：加{G}。
{X}{G}：直到回合结束，多头蛇蜥巢穴成为X/X绿色多头龙生物。它仍然是地。X不能为0。

foreignNames.name: 多頭蛇蜥巢穴
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控兩個或更多其他地，則多頭蛇蜥巢穴須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{G}。
{X}{G}：直到回合結束，多頭蛇蜥巢穴成為X/X綠色多頭龍生物。它仍然是地。X不能為0。

cards.originalText:
If you control two or more other lands, Lair of the Hydra enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
{X}{G}: Until end of turn, Lair of the Hydra becomes an X/X green Hydra creature. It's still a land. X can't be 0.

cards.name: Temple of the Dragon Queen
cards.text:
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield tapped unless you revealed a Dragon card this way or you control a Dragon.
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: A Dragon card is a card with the creature type Dragon in its type line. Similarly, a creature on the battlefield is a Dragon if it has the Dragon creature type. A card that has “Dragon” in the name (such as Temple of the Dragon Queen) isn't a Dragon card unless it also has the Dragon creature type.

foreignNames.name: Tempel der Drachenkönigin
foreignNames.text:
Sowie der Tempel der Drachenkönigin ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Drache-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen. Der Tempel der Drachenkönigin kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du hast auf diese Weise eine Drache-Karte offen vorgezeigt oder du kontrollierst einen Drachen.
Sowie der Tempel der Drachenkönigin ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignNames.name: Templo de la Reina de los Dragones
foreignNames.text:
En cuanto el Templo de la Reina de los Dragones entre al campo de batalla, puedes mostrar una carta de Dragón de tu mano. El Templo de la Reina de los Dragones entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que muestres una carta de Dragón de esta manera o controles un Dragón.
En cuanto el Templo de la Reina de los Dragones entre al campo de batalla, elige un color.
{T}: Agrega un maná del color elegido.

foreignNames.name: Temple de la Reine des Dragons
foreignNames.text:
Au moment où le Temple de la Reine des Dragons arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez révéler une carte de dragon de votre main. Le Temple de la Reine des Dragons arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous n'ayez révélé une carte de dragon de cette manière ou que vous ne contrôliez un dragon.
Au moment où le Temple de la Reine des Dragons arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignNames.name: Tempio della Regina dei Draghi
foreignNames.text:
Mentre il Tempio della Regina dei Draghi entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi rivelare una carta Drago dalla tua mano. Il Tempio della Regina dei Draghi entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non riveli una carta Drago in questo modo o non controlli un Drago.
Mentre il Tempio della Regina dei Draghi entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana del colore scelto.

foreignNames.name: ドラゴンの女王の寺院
foreignNames.text:
ドラゴンの女王の寺院が戦場に出るに際し、あなたはあなたの手札にあるドラゴン・カード１枚を公開してもよい。これによりあなたがドラゴン・カードを公開したか、あなたがドラゴンをコントロールしているのでないかぎり、ドラゴンの女王の寺院はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
ドラゴンの女王の寺院が戦場に出るに際し、色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignNames.name: 용 여왕의 신전
foreignNames.text:
용 여왕의 신전이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 당신의 손에서 용 카드 한 장을 공개할 수 있다. 용 여왕의 신전은 당신이 이런 식으로 용 카드를 공개하거나 당신이 용을 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
용 여왕의 신전이 전장에 들어올 때, 색 하나를 선택한다.
{T}: 선택된 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.

foreignNames.name: Templo da Rainha Dragão
foreignNames.text:
Conforme Templo da Rainha Dragão entra no campo de batalha, você pode revelar um card de Dragão de sua mão. Templo da Rainha Dragão entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você tenha revelado um card de Dragão dessa forma ou controle um Dragão.
Conforme Templo da Rainha Dragão entrar no campo de batalha, escolha uma cor.
{T}: Adicione um mana da cor escolhida.

foreignNames.name: Храм Королевы Драконов
foreignNames.text:
При выходе Храма Королевы Драконов на поле битвы вы можете показать карту Дракона из вашей руки. Храм Королевы Драконов выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если только вы не показали таким образом карту Дракона или не контролируете Дракона.
При выходе Храма Королевы Драконов на поле битвы выберите цвет.
{T}: добавьте одну ману выбранного цвета.

foreignNames.name: 龙后神殿
foreignNames.text:
于龙后神殿进战场时，你可以从手上展示一张龙牌。除非你以此法展示龙牌或你操控龙，否则龙后神殿须横置进战场。
于龙后神殿进战场时，选择一种颜色。
{T}：加一点该色的法术力。

foreignNames.name: 龍后神殿
foreignNames.text:
於龍后神殿進戰場時，你可以從手上展示一張龍牌。除非你以此法展示龍牌或你操控龍，否則龍后神殿須橫置進戰場。
於龍后神殿進戰場時，選擇一種顏色。
{T}：加一點該色的魔法力。

cards.originalText:
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield tapped unless you revealed a Dragon card this way or you control a Dragon.
As Temple of the Dragon Queen enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

cards.name: Treasure Vault
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifice Treasure Vault: Create X Treasure tokens.
cards.flavor: There is wealth enough inside to cause the rise and the ruin of dynasties.

foreignNames.name: Schatzkammer
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, opfere die Schatzkammer: Erzeuge X Schatz-Spielsteine.
foreignNames.flavor: Darin verbirgt sich genug Reichtum, um den Aufstieg und Fall ganzer Dynastien zu verursachen.

foreignNames.name: Cámara del tesoro
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, sacrificar la Cámara del tesoro: Crea X fichas de Tesoro.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay suficientes riquezas como para causar el auge y la ruina de varias dinastías.

foreignNames.name: Salle au trésor
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, sacrifiez la Salle au trésor : Créez X jetons Trésor.
foreignNames.flavor: Elle renferme suffisamment de richesses pour provoquer l'ascension ou la chute de dynasties entières.

foreignNames.name: Sala del Tesoro
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifica la Sala del Tesoro: Crea X pedine Tesoro.
foreignNames.flavor: Contiene ricchezze tali da poter causare l'ascesa e la rovina di intere dinastie.

foreignNames.name: 宝物庫
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{X}{X}, {T}, 宝物庫を生け贄に捧げる：宝物・トークンＸ個を生成する。
foreignNames.type: アーティファクト・土地
foreignNames.flavor: 中には王朝の興亡の原因になるほどの財宝が保管されている。

foreignNames.name: 보물 금고
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {C}를 추가한다.
{X}{X}, {T}, 보물 금고를 희생한다: 보물 토큰 X개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그 안에는 왕국의 흥망성쇠를 일으킬 수 있을 정도의 재물이 있다.

foreignNames.name: Câmara do Tesouro
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, sacrifique Câmara do Tesouro: Crie X fichas de Tesouro.
foreignNames.flavor: Lá dentro há riquezas suficientes para provocar a ascensão e a queda de dinastias.

foreignNames.name: Пещера Сокровищ
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, пожертвуйте Пещеру Сокровищ: создайте X фишек Клада.
foreignNames.flavor: Богатства здесь достаточно, чтобы устроить восхождение и падение целых династий.

foreignNames.name: 宝窖
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{X}{X}，{T}，牺牲宝窖：派出X个珍宝衍生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 其中财富足以主宰王朝兴亡。

foreignNames.name: 寶窖
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{X}{X}，{T}，犧牲寶窖：派出X個珍寶衍生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 其中財富足以主宰王朝興亡。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}, Sacrifice Treasure Vault: Create X Treasure tokens.

cards.name: Plains
cards.flavor: You've traced the tensions in Ten-Towns to the dwindling reindeer populations ... but what has been hunting them?

foreignNames.name: Ebene
foreignNames.flavor: Unter dem Wüstensand habt ihr eine außerweltliche Kraft entdeckt, die vor unvorstellbarer Energie pulsiert.

foreignNames.name: Llanura
foreignNames.flavor: Tras aventurarse bajo las arenas del desierto, el grupo descubre un poder sobrenatural que vibra con una energía inconcebible.

foreignNames.name: Plaine
foreignNames.flavor: En vous aventurant sous le sable du désert, vous découvrez une puissance inconnue dégageant une énergie inconcevable.

foreignNames.name: Pianura
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre vi avventurate nelle profondità dei deserti di sabbia, scoprite una forza aliena che pulsa con un'energia straordinaria.

foreignNames.name: 平地
foreignNames.flavor: 砂漠の砂の地下洞窟を探索していると、君は未知なるエネルギーが脈動する異星の力を発見した。

foreignNames.name: 들
foreignNames.flavor: 사막의 모래 아래를 탐험하던 당신은 상상할 수 없는 에너지가 맥박처럼 고동치는 외계의 힘을 발견했다.

foreignNames.name: Planície
foreignNames.flavor: Aventurando-se sob as areias do deserto, vocês descobrem um poder alienígena pulsando com uma energia imensurável.

foreignNames.name: Равнина
foreignNames.flavor: Решившись выяснить, что же скрывают пески пустыни, вы обнаружили чужеродную силу, излучающую неизвестную энергию.

foreignNames.name: 平原
foreignNames.flavor: 你冒险深入黄沙之底，找到一股脉动着不可思议能源的奇异力量。

foreignNames.name: 平原
foreignNames.flavor: 你冒險深入黃沙之底，找到一股脈動著不可思議能源的奇異力量。

foreignNames.name: 平原
foreignNames.flavor: 你冒險深入黃沙之底，找到一股脈動著不可思議能源的奇異力量。

cards.name: Island
cards.flavor: In crystal-studded waters far below the surface, you've discovered an incubating egg of mysterious origin.

foreignNames.name: Insel
foreignNames.flavor: Alarmiert durch die Neuigkeiten, die ihr überbracht habt, hat der Sturmriesenkönig des Mahlstroms den Stammesrat einberufen.

foreignNames.name: Isla
foreignNames.flavor: Alarmado por las noticias que trae el grupo, el rey de los gigantes de las tormentas de la Vorágine convoca a su pueblo a un consejo.

foreignNames.name: Île
foreignNames.flavor: Inquiet suite aux nouvelles que vous lui avez rapportées, le roi des géants des tempêtes du Maelstrom a réuni ses conseillers.

foreignNames.name: Isola
foreignNames.flavor: Allarmato dalle notizie che gli avete riferito, il gigante delle tempeste re del Maelstrom ha convocato la sua gente al consiglio.

foreignNames.name: 島
foreignNames.flavor: 君の知らせに危機感を抱いたメイルストロムのストーム・ジャイアントの王は、一族を議会に招集した。

foreignNames.name: 섬
foreignNames.flavor: 당신이 가져온 소식에 놀란 마엘스트롬의 폭풍 거인 왕은 그의 종족들을 평의회에 소집했다.

foreignNames.name: Ilha
foreignNames.flavor: Alarmado pelas notícias que vocês trouxeram, o rei dos gigantes da tempestade de Maelstrom convocou seu povo para um conselho.

foreignNames.name: Остров
foreignNames.flavor: Встревоженный вашими известиями, король штормовых великанов Мальстрема призвал своих собратьев на совет.

foreignNames.name: 海岛
foreignNames.flavor: 你带来的消息警醒了漩涡堡的风暴巨人王，他随即召集族人讨论相关事宜。

foreignNames.name: 海島
foreignNames.flavor: 你帶來的消息警醒了漩渦堡的風暴巨人王，他隨即召集族人討論相關事宜。

cards.name: Island
cards.flavor: After careful study, you've determined that the giant ruins served to track the movement of the planets ... and they will soon align once more.

foreignNames.name: Insel
foreignNames.flavor: Alarmiert durch die Neuigkeiten, die ihr überbracht habt, hat der Sturmriesenkönig des Mahlstroms den Stammesrat einberufen.

foreignNames.name: Isla
foreignNames.flavor: Alarmado por las noticias que trae el grupo, el rey de los gigantes de las tormentas de la Vorágine convoca a su pueblo a un consejo.

cards.name: Swamp
cards.flavor: As a plague ravages the world above, you've made your way into the Underdark in search of a fungal panacea.

foreignNames.name: Sumpf
foreignNames.flavor: Ihr hattet erwartet, in dieser alten Ruine auf feindselige Drow zu treffen … Aber sie sind längst geflohen. Welche Dunkelheit könnte sie vertrieben haben?

foreignNames.name: Pantano
foreignNames.flavor: El grupo contaba con enfrentarse a un grupo de drows hostiles en estas ruinas antiguas..., pero los elfos huyeron hace mucho tiempo. ¿Qué fuerzas oscuras pudieron haberlos expulsado?

foreignNames.name: Marais
foreignNames.flavor: Vous vous attendiez à rencontrer des drows hostiles dans cette ruine ancienne... Mais ils sont partis il y a bien longtemps. Quelle obscure force a bien pu les chasser ?

foreignNames.name: Palude
foreignNames.flavor: Vi aspettavate di incontrare dei drow ostili tra queste antiche rovine... ma hanno abbandonato questi luoghi molto tempo fa. Quale oscurità può mai averli costretti a fuggire?

foreignNames.name: 沼
foreignNames.flavor: この古代の遺跡では狂暴なドラウに遭遇するはずなのだが…既にもぬけの殻だ。奴らでさえ尻尾を巻いて逃げる闇とは一体何なのだろうか？

foreignNames.name: 늪
foreignNames.flavor: 당신은 이 고대 유적지에서 적대적인 드로우들을 만나리라 예상했지만 . . . 그들은 이미 오래 전에 도망치고 난 뒤였다. 어떤 사악한 존재가 그들을 몰아낸 것일까?

foreignNames.name: Pântano
foreignNames.flavor: Vocês esperavam encontrar drows hostis nesta ruína antiga... mas eles fugiram há muito tempo. Que escuridão poderia ter causado esta fuga?

foreignNames.name: Болото
foreignNames.flavor: Среди этих древних руин вы ожидали встретить враждебных дроу… Но их давно здесь нет. Что за темные силы могли изгнать их отсюда?

foreignNames.name: 沼泽
foreignNames.flavor: 你本以为会在这片古老遗迹中遇到怀有敌意的卓尔精灵…但他们早已逃离。连他们都无法抗衡的黑暗究竟是何等面貌？

foreignNames.name: 沼澤
foreignNames.flavor: 你本以為會在這片古老遺跡中遇到懷有敵意的卓爾精靈…但他們早已逃離。連他們都無法抗衡的黑暗究竟是何等面貌？

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavor: You meant to simply rest in Hundelstone, but the miners have told you stories of whispers in the dark below.

foreignNames.name: Gebirge
foreignNames.flavor: Als ihr euer Lager in der Nähe der alten Ruine aufschlagt, hört ihr das Echo von Trommeln aus Hallen, in denen seit Generationen kein Zwerg mehr lebt.

foreignNames.name: Montaña
foreignNames.flavor: Mientras el grupo acampa cerca de las ruinas antiguas, el sonido de unos tambores retumba en los salones que los enanos abandonaron hace generaciones.

foreignNames.name: Montagne
foreignNames.flavor: En montant le camp près de l'ancienne ruine, vous entendez un bruit tambours résonnerdans des salles où aucun nain n'a vécu depuis des générations.

foreignNames.name: Montagna
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre vi accampate nei pressi delle antiche rovine, dalle sale che i nani hanno abbandonato ormai da generazioni sopraggiunge l'eco di tamburi.

foreignNames.name: 山
foreignNames.flavor: 君が古代の遺跡付近で野営していると、ドワーフが去って久しい聖堂から太鼓が鳴り響く音が聞こえてきた。

foreignNames.name: 산
foreignNames.flavor: 고대 유적지 근처에서 야영 준비를 하던 당신은, 오랜 세월 드워프가 살았던 적이 없는 곳의 회랑에서 북소리가 메아리치는 것을 들었다.

foreignNames.name: Montanha
foreignNames.flavor: Enquanto montam acampamento nos arredores da antiga ruína, vocês ouvem um rufar de tambores dos salões abandonados pelos anões há gerações.

foreignNames.name: Гора
foreignNames.flavor: Разбив лагерь возле древних руин, вы слышите звук барабанов, эхом отдающийся в залах, где на протяжении нескольких поколений не жил ни один дварф.

foreignNames.name: 山脉
foreignNames.flavor: 你于古老遗迹附近扎营时，听见鼓声在大厅中回响，但数代之前便已无矮人居住该处。

foreignNames.name: 山脈
foreignNames.flavor: 你於古老遺跡附近紮營時，聽見鼓聲在大廳中迴響，但數代之前便已無矮人居住該處。

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavor: Your path lies across the Spine of the World, where every cave hides some new danger.

foreignNames.name: Gebirge
foreignNames.flavor: Als ihr euer Lager in der Nähe der alten Ruine aufschlagt, hört ihr das Echo von Trommeln aus Hallen, in denen seit Generationen kein Zwerg mehr lebt.

cards.flavor: You've ventured deep into the heart of the mountain to determine what can calm its quaking rage.

foreignNames.name: Gebirge
foreignNames.flavor: Als ihr euer Lager in der Nähe der alten Ruine aufschlagt, hört ihr das Echo von Trommeln aus Hallen, in denen seit Generationen kein Zwerg mehr lebt.

foreignNames.name: Montaña
foreignNames.flavor: Mientras el grupo acampa cerca de las ruinas antiguas, el sonido de unos tambores retumba en los salones que los enanos abandonaron hace generaciones.

foreignNames.name: Montagne
foreignNames.flavor: En montant le camp près de l'ancienne ruine, vous entendez un bruit tambours résonnerdans des salles où aucun nain n'a vécu depuis des générations.

foreignNames.name: Montagna
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre vi accampate nei pressi delle antiche rovine, dalle sale che i nani hanno abbandonato ormai da generazioni sopraggiunge l'eco di tamburi.

foreignNames.name: 山
foreignNames.flavor: 君が古代の遺跡付近で野営していると、ドワーフが去って久しい聖堂から太鼓が鳴り響く音が聞こえてきた。

foreignNames.name: 산
foreignNames.flavor: 고대 유적지 근처에서 야영 준비를 하던 당신은, 오랜 세월 드워프가 살았던 적이 없는 곳의 회랑에서 북소리가 메아리치는 것을 들었다.

foreignNames.name: Montanha
foreignNames.flavor: Enquanto montam acampamento nos arredores da antiga ruína, vocês ouvem um rufar de tambores dos salões abandonados pelos anões há gerações.

foreignNames.name: Гора
foreignNames.flavor: Разбив лагерь возле древних руин, вы слышите звук барабанов, эхом отдающийся в залах, где на протяжении нескольких поколений не жил ни один дварф.

foreignNames.name: 山脈
foreignNames.flavor: 你於古老遺跡附近紮營時，聽見鼓聲在大廳中迴響，但數代之前便已無矮人居住該處。

cards.name: Mountain
cards.flavor: As you make camp near the ancient ruin, you hear the sound of drums echoing in halls where no dwarf has lived in generations.

foreignNames.name: 山脉
foreignNames.flavor: 你于古老遗迹附近扎营时，听见鼓声在大厅中回响，但数代之前便已无矮人居住该处。

foreignNames.name: 山脈
foreignNames.flavor: 你於古老遺跡附近紮營時，聽見鼓聲在大廳中迴響，但數代之前便已無矮人居住該處。

cards.name: Forest
cards.flavor: As the sun reaches its zenith on the day of the solstice, a castle shimmers into view on the hilltop, just as the ancient text predicted.

foreignNames.name: Wald
foreignNames.flavor: Bevor die Elfenkönigin euch hilft, müsst ihr einen Weg finden, die merkwürdige Fäule zu heilen, die die Wurzeln der alten Bäume befallen hat.

foreignNames.name: Bosque
foreignNames.flavor: Antes de que la reina de los elfos preste su ayuda, el grupo debe encontrar un modo de remediar la extraña podredumbre que afecta a las raíces de los árboles ancianos.

foreignNames.name: Forêt
foreignNames.flavor: Avant que la reine elfe ne vous aide, vous devez trouver le moyen de soigner l'étrange pourriture qui touche les racines des arbres ancestraux.

foreignNames.name: Foresta
foreignNames.flavor: Prima che la regina degli elfi decida di aiutarvi, dovete trovare una cura contro lo stato di putrefazione in cui versano le radici degli alberi antichi.

foreignNames.name: 森
foreignNames.flavor: エルフの女王の助力を得る前に、君は古木の音を蝕む奇妙な腐敗の治療法を見つけなければならない。

foreignNames.name: 숲
foreignNames.flavor: 엘프 여왕이 당신을 돕기 전에, 당신은 먼저 고대 숲의 뿌리를 좀먹고 있는 기이한 부패병에 대한 치료법을 찾아야만 한다.

foreignNames.name: Floresta
foreignNames.flavor: Antes de obter a ajuda da rainha elfa, vocês devem encontrar uma maneira de curar o estranho apodrecimento que aflige as raízes das árvores antigas.

foreignNames.name: Лес
foreignNames.flavor: Чтобы добиться помощи королевы эльфов, вам придется найти способ вылечить странную гниль, что поражает корни древних деревьев.

foreignNames.name: 树林
foreignNames.flavor: 你要想得精灵女王出手相助，便需先治愈古老树根，使其免受怪异腐疾折磨。

foreignNames.name: 樹林
foreignNames.flavor: 你若想得精靈女王出手相助，便需先治癒古老樹根，使其免受怪異腐疾折磨。

cards.name: Forest
cards.flavor: As you venture deeper under the boughs of Neverwinter Wood, arrows in a tree trunk suggest you might not be welcome.

cards.name: Grand Master of Flowers
cards.text:
As long as Grand Master of Flowers has seven or more loyalty counters on him, he's a 7/7 Dragon God creature with flying and indestructible.
[+1]: Target creature without first strike, double strike, or vigilance can't attack or block until your next turn.
[+1]: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Monk of the Open Hand, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

rulings.text: While Grand Master of Flowers is a creature, he is not a planeswalker. He cannot be attacked and damage dealt to him while he is a creature will not reduce the number of loyalty counters he has. However, you may still activate his loyalty abilities as normal.
You can activate the last ability of Grand Master of Flowers even if there isn't a card named Monk of the Open Hand in your library or graveyard.

The first ability of Grand Master of Flowers doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to. Similarly, players can't respond to paying the cost of adding loyalty counters for an ability. Therefore, if Grand Master of Flowers has six loyalty and you activate one of his abilities, he will be a 7/7 Dragon God with flying and indestructible before players can respond to the loyalty ability.

If Grand Master of Flowers somehow gains enough loyalty to become a creature while it is being attacked, it is removed from combat. If blockers haven't been declared yet, it may then block. It may even block creatures that were previously attacking it. Creatures that were previously attacking it that go unblocked won't deal combat damage.

foreignNames.name: Großmeister der Blumen
foreignNames.text:
Solange auf dem Großmeister der Blumen sieben oder mehr Loyalitätsmarken liegen, ist er eine 7/7 Drache-Gott-Kreatur mit Flugfähigkeit und Unzerstörbarkeit.
+1: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ohne Erstschlag, Doppelschlag oder Wachsamkeit kann bis zu deinem nächsten Zug nicht angreifen oder blocken.
+1: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek und/oder deinen Friedhof nach einer Karte namens Mönch der offenen Hand, zeige sie offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Falls du auf diese Weise deine Bibliothek durchsuchst, mische danach.

foreignNames.name: Gran Maestro de las Flores
foreignNames.text:
Mientras el Gran Maestro de las Flores tenga siete o más contadores de lealtad sobre él, es una criatura Deidad Dragón 7/7 con las habilidades de volar e indestructible.
+1: La criatura objetivo sin las habilidades de dañar primero, dañar dos veces o vigilancia no puede atacar ni bloquear hasta tu próximo turno.
+1: Busca en tu biblioteca y/o cementerio una carta llamada Monje de la Mano Abierta, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Si buscas en tu biblioteca de esta manera, baraja.

foreignNames.name: Grand maître des fleurs
foreignNames.text:
Tant que le Grand maître des fleurs a au moins sept marqueurs « loyauté » sur lui, c'est une créature 7/7 Dragon et Dieu avec le vol et l'indestructible.
+1: Une créature ciblée sans l'initiative, la double initiative ou la vigilance ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer jusqu'à votre prochain tour.
+1: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque et/ou votre cimetière une carte appelée Moine de la main ouverte, révélez-la et mettez-la dans votre main. Si vous cherchez dans votre bibliothèque de cette manière, mélangez.

foreignNames.name: Gran Maestro dei Fiori
foreignNames.text:
Fintanto che il Gran Maestro dei Fiori ha sette o più segnalini fedeltà, è una creatura Dio Drago 7/7 con volare e indistruttibile.
+1: Una creatura bersaglio senza attacco improvviso, doppio attacco o cautela non può attaccare o bloccare fino al tuo prossimo turno.
+1: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio e/o il tuo cimitero per una carta chiamata Monaco della Mano Aperta, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano. Se passi in rassegna il tuo grimorio in questo modo, rimescola.

foreignNames.name: 花の大導師
foreignNames.text:
花の大導師の上に７個以上の忠誠カウンターが置かれているかぎり、これは飛行と破壊不能を持つ７/７のドラゴン・神・クリーチャーである。
+1：先制攻撃や二段攻撃や警戒を持たないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたの次のターンまで、それでは攻撃もブロックもできない。
+1：あなたのライブラリーやあなたの墓地から「素拳のモンク」という名前のカード１枚を探し、公開してあなたの手札に加える。これによりあなたがあなたのライブラリーからカードを探したなら、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — バハムート

foreignNames.name: 꽃의 거장
foreignNames.text:
꽃의 거장이 충성 카운터를 일곱 개 이상 가지고 있는 한, 꽃의 거장은 비행 및 무적을 가진 7/7 용 신 생물이다.
+1: 선제공격, 이단공격, 또는 경계가 없는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 당신의 다음 턴까지 공격하거나 방어할 수 없다.
+1: 당신의 서고 및/또는 무덤에서 이름이 맨손의 승려인 카드 한 장을 찾아, 공개하고, 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 이런 식으로 당신의 서고를 찾아보았다면, 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Grão-mestre das Flores
foreignNames.text:
Enquanto Grão-mestre das Flores tem sete ou mais marcadores de lealdade, ele é uma criatura Dragão Deus 7/7 com voar e indestrutível.
+1: A criatura alvo sem iniciativa, golpe duplo ou vigilância não pode atacar nem bloquear até seu próximo turno.
+1: Procure em seu grimório e/ou cemitério um card com o nome Monge da Mão Espalmada, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Se você procurar em seu grimório dessa forma, embaralhe.

foreignNames.name: Магистр Цветов
foreignNames.text:
Пока на Магистре Цветов есть семь или больше жетонов верности, он является существом 7/7 Дракон Бог с Полетом и Неразрушимостью.
+1: целевое существо без Первого удара, Двойного удара или Бдительности не может атаковать или блокировать до вашего следующего хода.
+1: найдите в вашей библиотеке и/или на вашем кладбище карту с именем Монах Открытой Ладони, покажите ее и положите в вашу руку. Если вы ищете таким образом в вашей библиотеке, перетасуйте ее.

foreignNames.name: 百花宗师
foreignNames.text:
只要百花宗师上有七个或更多忠诚指示物，他便是7/7龙／神生物，且具有飞行与不灭异能。
+1：直到你的下一个回合，目标不具有先攻，连击或警戒异能的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。
+1：从你的牌库和／或坟墓场中搜寻一张名称为散打武僧的牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。如果你以此法搜寻你的牌库，则洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 百花宗師
foreignNames.text:
只要百花宗師上有七個或更多忠誠指示物，他便是7/7龍／神生物，且具有飛行與不滅異能。
+1：直到你的下一個回合，目標不具有先攻，連擊或警戒異能的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋。
+1：從你的牌庫和／或墳墓場中搜尋一張名稱為散打武僧的牌，展示該牌，並將它置於你手上。如果你以此法搜尋你的牌庫，則洗牌。

cards.originalText:
As long as Grand Master of Flowers has seven or more loyalty counters on him, he's a 7/7 Dragon God creature with flying and indestructible.
+1: Target creature without first strike, double strike, or vigilance can't attack or block until your next turn.
+1: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Monk of the Open Hand, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

cards.name: Mordenkainen
cards.text:
[+2]: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
[−2]: Create a blue Dog Illusion creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand."
[−10]: Exchange your hand and library, then shuffle. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

rulings.text: The power and toughness of the Dog Illusion token will change as the number of cards in your hand changes.
The cards put into your hand due to Mordenkainen's last ability aren't “drawn.” Anything that cares about you drawing cards won't notice your hand suddenly becoming very, very well-stocked.

foreignNames.name: Mordenkainen
foreignNames.text:
+2: Ziehe zwei Karten und lege dann eine Karte aus deiner Hand unter deine Bibliothek.
−2: Erzeuge einen blauen Hund-Illusion-Kreaturenspielstein mit „Stärke und Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur sind gleich der doppelten Anzahl an Karten auf deiner Hand."
−10: Tausche deine Hand und Bibliothek und mische danach. Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Du hast keine maximale Handkartenzahl."

foreignNames.name: Mordenkainen
foreignNames.text:
+2: Roba dos cartas, luego pon una carta de tu mano en el fondo de tu biblioteca.
−2: Crea una ficha de criatura Ilusión Perro azul con "Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia de esta criatura son iguales al doble de la cantidad de cartas en tu mano".
−10: Intercambia tu mano y biblioteca y luego baraja. Obtienes un emblema con "Tu mano no tiene tamaño máximo".

foreignNames.name: Mordenkainen
foreignNames.text:
+2: Piochez deux cartes, puis mettez une carte de votre main au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.
−2: Créez un jeton de créature bleue Chien et Illusion avec « La force et l'endurance de cette créature sont chacune égales au double du nombre de cartes dans votre main. »
−10: Échangez votre main et votre bibliothèque, puis mélangez. Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Il n'y a pas de limite au nombre de cartes dans votre main ».

foreignNames.name: Mordenkainen
foreignNames.text:

cards.name: Zariel, Archduke of Avernus
cards.text:
[+1]: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
[0]: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
[−6]: You get an emblem with "At the end of the first combat phase on your turn, untap target creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase."

rulings.text: There is no main phase between the combat phases. You move from the first combat phase directly into the second combat phase.
The ability of the emblem can target any creature you control, not just one that's tapped.

If the target of the emblem's ability becomes an illegal target by the time the ability tries to resolve, the ability won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't get an additional combat phase.

If you have more than one of Zariel's emblem, the abilities will each trigger at the end of the first combat phase on your turn. You can choose the same creature as the target of each ability. Those targets will untap before any additional combats. No creatures will untap between the first additional combat and the second additional combat (or between the second and third, and so on, and wow, how long was Zariel under your control?!)

cards.name: Ellywick Tumblestrum
cards.text:
[+1]: Venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
[−2]: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. If it's legendary, you gain 3 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[−7]: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have trample and haste and get +2/+2 for each differently named dungeon you've completed."

rulings.text: Ellywick Tumblestrum's last ability counts all dungeons you've completed, whether they were completed before or after the emblem was created.
The emblem grants trample and haste even if you haven't completed a dungeon.

To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player’s deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room’s ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you’re already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.
